title: Introducing: BUIL_DINGS
content:
I know for a fact that London four piece BUIL_DINGS have already begun gathering a decent stream of hype, however to be honest, I’m somewhat undecided.

With only one track available so far, in the form of the melodic indie number Eyes On Sunrise, it’s guaranteed to have the LDN scene-kids foaming at the mouth. It’s not that this debut effort from BUIL_DINGS is offensive on the ears; in fact, it’s pleasantly listenable, yet rarely strays from it’s comfort zone. The Foals influence is all too prominent and mimicked throughout Eyes On Sunrise, most notoriously through the shimmering guitars and subtle vocals. It’s quite perplexing and unfortunate in truth because BUIL_DINGS clearly know their way around a song, here’s hoping they strive to carve out their own sound once they’ve found their feet.

E Y E S O N S U N R I S E by B U I L_D I N G S
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
